title: 彿州Monroe County市長：風暴期間911服務將會中止

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/cnn/videos/10157282122876509/

We are not going to put our first responders at risk because of stupidity. And those people will be on their own when this storm hits. If they have not evacuated, it is irresponsible, selfish position that these people are taking.
香港應該效法
